All Implemented Interfaces:

Direct Known Subclasses:
ClassRelationshipEdge
public abstract class SegmentedLineEdge
extends ShapeEdge

An edge that is composed of multiple line segments

drawString

private static void drawString(java.awt.Graphics2D g2,

                               ArrowHead arrow,
                               java.lang.String s,
                               boolean center)
Draws a string.

Parameters:
g2 - the graphics context
p - an endpoint of the segment along which to draw the string
q - the other endpoint of the segment along which to draw the string
s - the string to draw
center - true if the string should be centered along the segment

Parameters:
g2 - the graphics context
p - an endpoint of the segment along which to draw the string
q - the other endpoint of the segment along which to draw the string
d - the bounds of the string to draw
center - true if the string should be centered along the segment
Returns:
the point at which to draw the string

Parameters:
g2 - the graphics context
p - an endpoint of the segment along which to draw the string
q - the other endpoint of the segment along which to draw the string
s - the string to draw
center - true if the string should be centered along the segment
Returns:
the rectangle enclosing the string
